Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the release of certain balloons
Summary: Prohibits the outdoor release of ten or more balloons filled with helium or a substance which causes the balloon to rise or float in the atmosphere, within a twenty-four hour period, in order to reduce litter and protect the marine environment; makes related provisions for enforcement and for certain exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the release of certain balloons
